Text: Are your interested in visiting the nd most favourite destination in Europe Dear Netclub member Are your interested in visiting the nd most favourite destination in Europe according to The Observer How about the th most favourite destination in the world voted by readers of the Telegraph Maybe the th best honeymoon destination in the world on wwwconfetticouk If you are then please read on and take a look at our Special fares and packages to Iceland Also dont forget to look at the great deals that we offer from London and Glasgow to the US These offers are ONLY bookable through our website wwwicelandaircouk or through email at Special Winter offer to Iceland incl tax Lucky fares from Glasgow and London to the US Icelandair Holidays Brochure now available on our website Special your username and password and click on BOOK SPECIAL OFFERS Lucky fares from Glasgow and London to the US in January and February from excluding tax and charges ONLY BOOKABLE ONLINE To book and for more information please go to login Enter your username and password and click on BOOK SPECIAL OFFERS Icelandair Holidays Brochure now available on our website The new Icelandair Holidays brochure features some exciting new highlights to Iceland with music and culture gourmet delights and spa specials introduced to meet the requirements of UK passengers The everpopular snowmobiling horse riding shopping and whale watching packages once again make a return and are sure to entice holidays Special Offer on the Iceland Surprise tour Hit the heart of the country on this trip over glaciers through that we have created and are only available to you on our website specialpackages Icelandair Hotels Special Offer on selected dates in January March Icelandair Hotels offers you great prices on specific dates in January February and March in one of their excellent hotels Rates start at ISK per room double or single use and breakfast buffet is included For more information about prices and on what dates this offer is VALID please go to hoteloffers HERTZ Car rental offer in Iceland We introduce in cooperation with HERTZ great deals on car rental in Iceland for pick up until the th of February hertz Icelandculturecom Get to know a different site of Iceland Icelandculturecom shows you a different site of Iceland It is not all about glaciers waterfalls and nature Do Icelanders all live in Igloos and are all Icelandic girls ft tall blonde and blue eyed Find out what the fashion is like in Iceland and what is happening in arts music design and last but not least the infamous nightlife Go to and see the other site of Iceland HOW TO BOOK A TICKET ONLINE AND OTHER USEFUL INFORMATION Please click on the link below or copy it and paste into your browser login Type in your user name password Click on BOOK SPECIAL OFFERS a If you are booking for the first time then you have to click on CLICK HERE IF YOU ARE BOOKING SPECIAL OFFERS FOR THE FIRST TIME and follow the steps b If you already have a Booking Profile then you can click on CLICK HERE TO BOOK SEARCH Fill in your travel details Click SUBMIT FLIGHT AVAILABILITY On the screen that appears make sure the correct flights are selected Click on SELECT FLIGHT ITINERARY Make sure you have the correct fare showing If you do not see the correct fare then the fare is sold out for the dates you have selected and you must select new set of dates The fare showing is always the best fare available Click CONTINUE TRIP PLAN Check the box in front of I agree to the conditions relating to the selected airfares Click on BOOK TRIP DETAILS AND PAYMENT Fill out the fields and click on CONFIRM CONFIRMATION You have now made a booking and will receive your ticket before you know it If you want detailed instructions on how to book online please go to lcinstructions TO UNSUBSCRIBE TO LUCKY FARES OR CHANGE PERSONAL INFORMATION Please click on the link below or copy it and paste into a browser login When you have logged in click on click here under CHANGE YOUR PROFILE If you just wish to change your email address get NetclubLucky Fares from other regions or edit your profile in any other way you can do so here However should you wish to unsubscribe you scroll down to the bottom of the form and remove the checkmark where you are asked if you would like to receive email notification of the Netclub offers Click on UPDATE PROFILE Click on Back to login page You can also send us an email at and let the word UNSUBSCRIBE appear in the subject line Please do not hesitate to contact us with questions or comments at the email address below Best Regards The Icelandair Netclub UK If you were forwarded this message and wish to subscribe go to newuser You are being sent this email because you have expressed an interest in receiving information from the Icelandair Netclub
